item.title: Ethical Hacking - Enumeration - Notes
item.description: These are just my notes from the video course: “Ethical Hacking: Enumeration”. Introduction Protocols/Technologies used in Enumeration DNS (port 21) SMTP (port 161) RPC NetBIOS (port 139) SMB (port 444) Protection Rings Every OS has it’s own set of Protection Rings -> for more see wiki Windows Kernel Protection rings Ring 0 - kernel mode Ring 1 & 2 - in windows it’s traditionally unused now it\s used for virtualization like Intel VtX Ring 3 - user mode OpenVMS has 4 rings:
